item.title: Nord Stream Pipelines leaks seen from space
item.author: Francesco Mancuso
item.description: Can Sentinel-1 see the Nord Stream leaks from space? Three leaks have been reported near the island of Bornholm, two pipelines running underwater from Russia to Germany were damaged some days ago. Figure 1: Pipelines’ map and leaks location. Source: Sky News Main Image Figure 2: Overview of the whole situation Other leaks Figure 3: 26 Semptmber 2022 First leak Figure 4: 27 Semptmber 2022 What does the tweets say #GasLeak This seems to be one of the gas leaks of the #nordstream1 or #nordstream2 gas pipelines in the #Baltic Sea.
